body: I didn't see rebase :) Still a lot of commits.

> Actually, only that make sense. Even more than this one. Think in this way, more and more optional plugins added, one day a new optional contributed, all codes are good. But will add one span to many other cases. Then what do you expect?

I got it. I will do this later.

You should learn from the existing case(https://github.com/apache/skywalking/tree/master/test/plugin/scenarios/solrj-7.x-scenario), and move the following two into the main repo.
1. https://github.com/SkyAPMTest/agent-auto-integration-testcases/tree/master/postgresql-scenario
1. https://github.com/SkyAPMTest/agent-auto-integration-testcases/tree/master/postgresql-9.4-scenario

You could ping me on QQ, wechat or mail, as we don't have the document(we are working on that) for the new plugin test development guide.
The old test includes 55 cases, https://github.com/SkyAPMTest/agent-integration-test-report#postgresql. Last time, we passed. This should be easy work to move them in.
@wu-sheng ok,thanks

> Seems it's unwise to do ES7 adaptation along with ES6 together, closing for now

If you want this, in my old-time, I am playing class loader game, which is not easy :) or redistributes a new release should be better.

> I got it. I will do this later.

Once you have that, I recommend you revert these two options, by providing specific plugin selector options, if you feel making sense too.

In theory, it is possible. The error local could happen occasionally. This seems a tricky issue. Set up an optimize lock and return the `getRemoteClient` replication list?

@hanahmily What do you think?

> 欢迎成为新的贡献者。

Thank you
@yanickxia I am also new to this issue, so if you find anything or I may say something wrong, please let me know.
FYI @kezhenxu94 @dmsolr @zhaoyuguang @IanCao We need more eyes on this, please review(not just PR, the original codes)
It wouldn't NPE, yes. But still it is not right. Because client list is there logically, and cause warning by concurrency access. So it is a code bug.

> It wouldn't NPE, yes. But still it is not wrong. Because client list is there logically, and cause warning by concurrency access. So it is a code bug.

you are right. maybe never return RemoteClient List during reBuildRemoteClients.
Never return is a dangerous, will cause performance unstable. Please consider to always maintain immutable list to outside use, and don't clear it.
#3603 merged. Please continue.

> #3603 merged. Please continue.
roger!

> Never return is a dangerous, will cause performance unstable. Please consider to always maintain immutable list to outside use, and don't clear it.

i refactor the rebuild logic, but have something question.
1. clientA & clientB is too hard understand, i guess that keep stable memory usage..
2. usingClients just a shadow ref to clientA or ClientB, i think without concurrency race during reBuildRemoteClients. when build a new client , at `switchCurrentClients` will switch to other one.
3. reBuildRemoteClients not ness synchronized protect it, because i invoke by refresh(), use scheduleWithFixedDelay more easy to understand
Could you add a test case for this?

> Could you add a test case for this?

Add a concurrency test for getRemoteClient while refresh. take a look
@dmsolr Your review
/run e2e
@dmsolr please review.
What is the point? The agent log is not business-related, and in most production env, it is off or error only(pretty small per day).

Yes, it is re-counting, because in agent sampling rate, you want to reduce the CPU or network costs. Then, a single-span segment without ref is most likely meaningless. So we ignore it.

Your question is?
OAP and web app run in the same container now, but the web app doesn't work in JDK9, I'm not sure whether we should also make it work in JDK9 and above (maybe)
Only one confusing thing, why coverage rate drops as you have added the test case. @JaredTan95 could you help on recheck?
@dmsolr If this is OK for you, please give an approve, even you don't have official approve today.
I think we should, and that should be easy for Spring based, right?
@dmsolr Solr 7.x seems unstable today. Please take a look.
/run agent-plugin-test
LGTM

> LGTM. @arugal How many test cases do we have today?
>
spring: 107
spring-async: 35
jetty: 63
httpclient: 14
ehcache: 19
dubbo: 14
spring-cloud-gateway: 3
solrj: 12

total: 266
@wu-sheng no question, tks
LGTM
/run ci

You need to develop a plugin to do that. Your guess is not totally rigtht. There are more inform than trace it. It is the propogatiom context.

Read plugin development document and protocol document.
Thank you.
I got it,thanks~
Maybe I can refer to the rocketmq plugin to implement it
Left side is a segment list, not trace list. If it runs in another thread. Then it is right.

Still not working, before was problem with namespace, logs from mixer policy:

HELP PLS

logging.max_history_files
OK, I know this is a feature of the next release.
/run ci
English only. And you need to explain, otherwise, we don't how to reply to an error log.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11767168/66913662-b0bc8580-f047-11e9-86c0-902516a4a190.png)

I specially printed the log to check this problem.It runs in the same thread.
I refer to the rocketmq 3.x plugin and add a plugin for aliyun ons(now renames:rocketmq 消息队列 ). But in my project,Iuse the RocketMQ  ComponentsDefine instead ons。 Does the community need it?

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11767168/66918094-2f69f080-f051-11e9-89d4-a9f71b4e425c.png)
Now  I have the same problem in 6.4.0.
@hanahmily Please take a look.
If you could download ons jar with acceptable license, such as from maven central directly, then we could accept that PR.
I can only tell you, these two means two segments, Others, you have to dig more about how plugin works and how it interacts with your codes.

VNode in your case, most likely your context leaks. VNode is designed for parent segment is missing, but this a segment is reported to backend. I can't tell you why, you need to learn the source codes of lettuce, and locate why the context is not right. Then we could discuss. 

Please don't discuss one thing in different issues, it is meaningless.
@x22x22 Update?
Any update?
@SevenBlue2018 This is a visualization feature, not a bug.
I think this is plugin bug you are facing, but you need to find it why, because we don't have the scenario you are facing.
@hanahmily This has been fixed.

> Any update?

sorry, no time to update code recently.
today I will close this PR, and reopen new one base on master.
ok  thank you!

拷贝skywalking 6.0.0 的undertow-2.x-plugin 插件，仅仅改了包名

在skywalking 6.5.0-SNAPSHOT版本 undertow 1.4.27版本测试通过

Hi @langyan1022 , I think we don't need to copy that. Maybe we rename the directory only. And add related versions list into `support-version.list`(testcase.yml). 

Also, the [plugin testcases repo](https://github.com/SkyAPMTest/agent-auto-integration-testcases) is closed. If you are interested that, welcome to(need to :-) ) join us what we have an [immigration plan](https://github.com/apache/skywalking/issues/3583).

What I did:
1. I selected `https://github.com/apache/skywalking-kubernetes/tree/master/helm-chart/helm3/6.4.0` to install skywalking backend.

1. apply `https://github.com/istio/istio/blob/1.3.3/mixer/template/metric/template.yaml` to install metric template

1. apply `https://github.com/apache/skywalking-kubernetes/blob/master/archive/6/6.0.0-GA/istio/02-skywalingadapter.yml` and `https://github.com/apache/skywalking-kubernetes/blob/master/archive/6/6.0.0-GA/istio/03-operator_cfg.yml` to install skywalking adapter.
